December 04, 2025

To: The Visa Officer,

Visa Application Centre Consulate General of Germany [Embassy Address Line 1: e.g. 100 Sathorn Road] [Embassy Address Line 2: e.g. Bangkok 10500, Thailand]

Subject: **Application for a $Tourist (Schengen C-Type) Visa**

Dear Visa Officer,

I am writing this letter to formally request the grant of a **$Tourist (Schengen C-Type) Visa** for my planned trip to **$Germany** and the Schengen area. My primary purpose for visiting is **$Leisure travel and sightseeing**.

My itinerary is planned for **$14 days**, commencing on **$January 31, 2026** and concluding on **$February 14, 2026**. I will be returning to my home country, Thailand, immediately upon the completion of my trip, as I have strong ties and professional commitments here.

All expenses related to my travel, accommodation, and personal needs during the stay will be fully covered by **$Personal savings and income (‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏∏‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏≠‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏à‡πà‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏á)**, as evidenced by the attached bank statements and other financial proofs. My accommodation and flight details are confirmed and enclosed.

LIST OF DOCUMENTS ENCLOSED:

  • Duly completed and signed Visa Application Form.
  • Valid Passport (No. $L887766) and photograph.
  • Detailed Flight Reservations (Round-trip ticket).
  • Confirmed Hotel Booking Confirmation for the entire stay.
  • Travel Medical Insurance (covering minimum required amount).
  • Proof of sufficient funds (Bank Statement / Certificate).
  • Employment / Business documents (e.g., Leave Approval Letter, Business Registration).
  • Copy of Residence Registration (for verification of home ties).

Thank you for your time and consideration of my application. I look forward to your favorable response.

Yours faithfully,
